name: part_010
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine performing her new song "Bishoujo Muzai♡Pirates" live on stage with high-energy choreography.
Post-live announcement segment featuring information about the new song's release, MV, and collaborations.

subtitles.english: I'll do anything, so don't abandon me, you guys

subtitles.original: ドキドキいってみたい

subtitles.original: たまにいじけちゃ
subtitles.english: Sometimes I get sulky,

subtitles.english: but that's fine

subtitles.original: 年頃だもん 本気にしちゃ

subtitles.original: 嵐の中も
subtitles.english: Even in the middle of a storm,

subtitles.original: 一緒に行こう！
subtitles.english: let's go together!

subtitles.english: Charm in my heart, Bishoujo Marine Time

subtitles.original: あれあれどうした めんどくさい
subtitles.english: Oh my, what's wrong? 'It's a bother,'

subtitles.english: you say that but,

subtitles.original: かまってくれるキミが好き
subtitles.english: I love that you still pay attention to me

subtitles.english: Kyu kyu kyunrun Kyu kyu kyunrun

subtitles.english: Having fun just ten steps into the park

subtitles.english: Please forgive me!

subtitles.english: This Marine's charm, magic, and inevitability!

subtitles.original: 罪な女ね
subtitles.english: A sinful woman, isn't she?

subtitles.original: 離さないで 捕まっていて
subtitles.english: Don't let go, keep holding on

subtitles.original: 世界の広さ 見せてあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll show you how vast the world is

subtitles.original: キュンとさせて美少女マリンタイム
subtitles.english: Make me feel 'kyun', Bishoujo Marine Time

subtitles.original: キミの一番目立たせよ
subtitles.english: Let's make you stand out the most

subtitles.original: そら冗談も
subtitles.english: Even jokes,

subtitles.original: 大好きだけど真剣よ
subtitles.english: I love them but I'm serious

subtitles.original: キュキュキュルン キュキュキュルン
subtitles.english: Kyu kyu kyunrun Kyu kyu kyunrun

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ち17歳
subtitles.english: Feeling in love, 17 years old

subtitles.original: てっぺんになっちゃうわ 大人の時間
subtitles.english: It's reaching the peak, adult time

subtitles.original: ドキドキしてる？
subtitles.english: Is your heart pounding?

subtitles.original: まだ早い！
subtitles.english: It's too early!

subtitles.original: 無罪！無罪！美少女無罪！
subtitles.english: Innocent! Innocent! Bishoujo's innocent!

subtitles.original: マリン！マリン！マリンは無罪！
subtitles.english: Marine! Marine! Marine's innocent!

subtitles.original: めっぽうキラキラ
subtitles.english: Extremely sparkling

subtitles.original: もっとクラクラ
subtitles.english: Getting more dizzy

subtitles.original: マリンじゃなくて...
subtitles.english: It's not Marine...

subtitles.original: マリン船長だろ！
subtitles.english: It's Captain Marine!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで早速ですが、
subtitles.english: Alright! So without further ado,

subtitles.original: 今お披露目した船長の新オリジナル曲「美少女無罪♡パイレーツ」は
subtitles.english: the Captain's new original song "Bishoujo Muzai♡Pirates" that I just performed,

subtitles.original: このあと22時からプレミア公開となっています！
subtitles.english: will have its premiere release at 10 PM tonight!

subtitles.original: 「Unison」「マリ箱」に引き続きのアニメチームに
subtitles.english: The same animation team that worked on "Unison" and "Marine Box",

subtitles.original: さらに増員して今までで一番すごい映像になったと思います！！
subtitles.english: with even more staff added, has created what I think is the most amazing video yet!!

subtitles.original: そしてなんと！今回は船長も
subtitles.english: And what's more! This time, even the Captain...

subtitles.original: 人生初のアニメ原画に参加させていただきました！
subtitles.english: ...participated in creating anime keyframes for the first time in her life!

subtitles.original: 船長が担当した箇所がどこかぜひ探してみてください！
subtitles.english: Please try to find which parts were done by the Captain!

subtitles.original: 今度答え合わせしましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's check the answers later!

subtitles.original: 楽曲はナナホシ管弦楽団様に書いていただきました！
subtitles.english: The song was written by Nanahoshi Orchestra!

subtitles.original: マリンの一味へ向けた、ラブソングとなっております。
subtitles.english: It's a love song dedicated to Marine's crew.

subtitles.original: 是非船長の愛を受け取るためにたくさん聴いてください！！
subtitles.english: Please listen to it a lot to receive the Captain's love!!

subtitles.original: このあと24時からは各種音楽サイトで配信もありますよ～
subtitles.english: From midnight tonight, it will also be available on various music streaming sites~

subtitles.original: さらにさらになんですが！Amazon Musicさんのプレイリスト
subtitles.english: And there's more! On Amazon Music's playlist...

subtitles.original: 「VIRTUALity」でこの曲をプッシュしてもらえることになりました！！
subtitles.english: ... "VIRTUALity", this song will be featured!!

subtitles.original: キミたちいっぱい聴いてください！
subtitles.english: You guys, please listen to it a lot!

subtitles.original: そしてなんと！全国のカラオケDAMで
subtitles.english: And! At karaoke DAM nationwide...

subtitles.original: 明日31日から歌えます！早い！
subtitles.english: ...you can sing it starting tomorrow, the 31st! That was fast!

subtitles.original: 本人映像（MV）も8月1日から順次配信開始になります！
subtitles.english: The original music video will also be available sequentially from August 1st!

subtitles.original: ぜひカラオケで仲間に布教してみてください！
subtitles.english: Please try to spread the word to your friends at karaoke!

subtitles.original: さらに！船長がDAMチャンネルにも出演予定ですので
subtitles.english: Also! The Captain is scheduled to appear on DAM Channel...

subtitles.original: お楽しみに！
subtitles.english: ...so look forward to it!

subtitles.original: まだあります！あの！
subtitles.english: There's still more! Like...

subtitles.original: 新宿駅東口のクロス新宿ビジョンにて
subtitles.english: ...on the Cross Shinjuku Vision at the Shinjuku Station East Exit...

subtitles.original: 「美少女無罪♡パイレーツ」の90秒のMV放映が決定しましたー！！
subtitles.english: a 90-second MV clip of "Bishoujo Muzai♡Pirates" will be broadcast!!

subtitles.original: 新宿駅東口のあの有名な猫ちゃんの所ですね！
subtitles.english: It's that famous spot with the cat at Shinjuku Station's East Exit!
The period is from 8/1 to 8/15...

subtitles.original: 7時～25時までですね。
subtitles.english: ...from 7 AM to 1 AM.

subtitles.original: 放映時間は日により変更となる場合があるようですが、
subtitles.english: The broadcast times may vary by day, but...

subtitles.original: 毎時1回は放映される予定です！！
subtitles.english: ...it's scheduled to be shown once every hour!!

subtitles.original: 最近気温も高いので
subtitles.english: The temperature has been high lately, so...

subtitles.original: ご覧になる際は体調管理にお気をつけくださいね！
subtitles.english: please take care of your health when you go to see it!

subtitles.original: もうこんな感じで、お楽しみが目白押しです！
subtitles.english: Anyway, there are so many things to look forward to!
